SELECT mi.Id as Id, mi.Org_Id as Org_Id, mi.MateName_ID as Material_Name_Id, mi.MateModel_ID as MaterialModel_Id, mn.Material_Name as Material_Name, mm.Material_Model as Material_Model
FROM Material_Info mi LEFT JOIN MaterName_Info mn ON mi.MateName_ID= mn.id LEFT JOIN MaterModel_Info mm ON mi.MateModel_ID= mm.id WHERE mi.Valid_Flag = 0 AND mi.Material_Mold = 1 AND mi.Org_ID = #{Org_ID} AND mi.Material_Type = #{Material_Type}
